I explored pgk1919 data in consideration with the simulated results.

```{r eval=FALSE}
att<-read.csv("attributes.csv", header=T)
pgk<-read.csv("pgk1919Nodes.csv", header=T)
pgk1919<- as.matrix(read.table("pgk1919.txt"))
p1919<-network(pgk1919)
plot(p1919,displayisolates=FALSE, arrow=FALSE)
```

## meeting chart in ggplot
```
att<-read.csv("attributes.csv", header=T)
pgk<-read.csv("pgk1919Nodes.csv", header=T)
merge<-merge(pgk,att, by="ID")
df<-data.frame(merge)
ggplot(df,aes(x=eventyear, y=Degree,))+geom_point()+stat_smooth()
```
```
att<-read.csv("attributes.csv", header=T)
pgk<-read.csv("pgk1919Nodes.csv", header=T)
merge<-merge(pgk,att, by="ID")
df<-data.frame(merge)
ggplot(df,aes(x=eventyear, y=Degree,))+geom_point()+stat_smooth()
```



```
att$detected<-as.numeric(att$eventyear==1919)
summary(att$detected)
kill<-att[,12]
gplot(p1919, displaylabels=F, arrow=F, vertex.col=kill, displayisolates=FALSE, vertex.cex=1)

```
